title: East West Line train fault causing delays

updates.text: [EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #Tampines and #PasirRis are now running normally.Free bus services have ceased.
[EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #Tampines and #PasirRis are now operating normally
[EWL] CLEARED: Train services between #Tampines and #PasirRis are now operating normally.
[EWL] UPDATE: Estimate 20 mins additional travel time between #Tampines and #PasirRis. We are working to recover service.
[EWL]: Estimate 20 mins additional travelling time from #Tampines to #PasirRis due to train fault.
